\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{sleep\_and\_wait()}{sleep\_and\_wait()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily void ncpp\+::pac\+::win\+\_\+thread\+::sleep\+\_\+and\+\_\+wait (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}



Sleeps and waits until the thread proc done. 

Notes\+: calling this method in main thread can cause std\+::cout not working.
